column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////I'm surprised I've never reviewed CBBR before because I'm such a big fan of it! The numerous options are great for foodies and trying things with friends. There are plenty of options for picky eaters as well
column2: if you've got someone with vegetarian/GF type restrictions or who is just plain picky. They do a great job of accommodating large groups as well so if you plan a group outing here it is easily doable!
